DOCNAME: CASE OF KONENKOVA and other "Privileged pensioners" v. RUSSIA
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicants are pensioners who live in LOC . Before retirement , they used to work in hazardous industries . They had a dispute with a pension authority about the scope of their privileged pensions and appealed to the GPE ’s town courts .

CARDINAL . In DATE the courts held for the applicants and ordered the pension authority to recalculate the pensions . The courts based their findings on ORG . These judgments became binding and were executed .

CARDINAL . On the pension authority ’s request , in DATE the town courts quashed their judgments due to discovery of new circumstances . The courts found , in particular , that the judgments had ignored the interpretation of ORG given by ORG in DATE and DATE .
CARDINAL . NORP The applicants’ cases were remitted for a rehearing and eventually dismissed .
